mapper.select: select count(1) as count from smbms_user
mapper.insert: insert into smbms_user (userCode, userName, userPassword, gender, birthday, phone, address, userRole, createdBy, creationDate, idPicPath) values (#{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userRole}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{idPicPath})
mapper.select: select u.*, r.roleName from smbms_user u, smbms_role r where u.userRole = r.id and u.id = #{id}
